name: Vermin Venture (UF Digital Worlds Institute)
description:
Vermin Venture

Created by Liam McKenna and Gabrielle Berman

2D platformer action game with a heroic sewer rat trying to get out of the dark underground passages.

Fly, double-jump, float, use your tail as a way to swing through the dark, evade hot sewage, dangers everywhere, and even a gigantic sewer alligator determined to end your run.

Get ready to run, just download and go!

Team personal Itch.io Vermin Venture page:

https://liamleeyum.itch.io/vermin-venture
